metadata.name: Legacy
metadata.description:
My mother wore it. 
Her mother wore it. 

Every fold, every tuck and every crease, filled with gentle intent. 
The intent to carry on a tradition of beauty.
A tradition that honours the land our foremothers nurtured.
Creating many shapes, forms and sizes, molding the head tie is a craft of love.
A craft to be treasured for centuries to come.

Akisi, Ichafu, Gele.

And now, itâ€™s my turn.
